job_description:
Strong Experience in full lifecycle software development (SDLC) including coding, code reviews, testing, handle maintenance and support activities.
Must have strong hands-on technical skills to contribute during technical design discussions and requirement clarifications.
Must have strong hands-on technical skills to contribute during technical design discussions and requirement clarifications.

Required Skills: Core Java, Java, Microservices, Spring Boot

minimum 10 years of IT experience.
